description: Calculates per-unit combat power for cultivator armies.
formula: Soul Force + Merged Spirit Power + Body + Equipment + 10% Group Combat Bonus
assumptions: Body = 30% of soul force baseline value
Equipment = matching rank value from equipment system
Merged Spirit Power = 60% of beast power (assumes matching-rank merge)
notes: Fighters have Soul Force = 0 and Merged Spirit Power = 0
